verses.verse: And when <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H8672>nine,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and <S%H1961>be<s%> thou <S%H8549>perfect.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and thee, and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
As for <S%H589>me,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853>shall<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> but thy <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H85>Abraham;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> a <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> thee.

And I will make thee <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of thee, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee.

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and thee and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee in their <S%H1755>generations<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> unto thee, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thee, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H853>thee,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein thou art a <S%H4033>stranger,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession;<s%> and I will <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> therefore, <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee in their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H8104>keep,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee; <S%H3605>Every<s%> man <S%H2145>child<s%> among you shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H6190>foreskin;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you.

And he that is <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> among you, <S%H3605>every<s%> man <S%H2145>child<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> he that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> or <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1121>stranger,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> of thy <S%H4480>seed.<s%> <S%H2233><s%>

He that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in thy <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he that is <S%H4736>bought<s%> with thy <S%H3701>money,<s%> must needs be <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> <S%H4135><s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> man <S%H2145>child<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H4480>people;<s%> <S%H5971><s%> he hath <S%H6565>broken<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> As for <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall her <S%H8034>name<s%> be.

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> her, and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> her: yea, I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> her, and she shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a mother of <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> her.

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H6711>laughed,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Shall a child be <S%H3205>born<s%> unto him that is a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old?<s%> and shall <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> that is <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1323>old,<s%> <S%H3205>bear?<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H3863>that<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> might <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee!

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> thy <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> thee a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H61>indeed;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac:<s%> and I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and with his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And as for <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thee: <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and will make him <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> him <S%H3966>exceedingly;<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> shall he <S%H3205>beget,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

But my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will I <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> unto thee at <S%H2088>this<s%> set <S%H4150>time<s%> in the <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>
And he left <S%H3615>off<s%> <S%H1696>talking<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, and <S%H430>God<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H4736>bought<s%> with his <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> in the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H854>unto<s%> him.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H8672>nine,<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>

And <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> <S%H853><s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>
In the <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>stranger,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> were <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.
